content:
# I successfully harvested 5 Coal, bringing my total Coal count to 25 in the inventory.
# However, I still have only 1 Stone Furnace available. 
# To proceed with crafting the Burner Mining Drill, I need to smelt the 12 Iron Ore into Iron Plates.

# Step 59: Place the Stone Furnace at my current position to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates.
# Since I am now at a different position, I will attempt to place the Stone Furnace again.
furnace_position = Position(x=22.5, y=-14.5)  # Current position for placing the furnace.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the furnace at the Coal position.
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {furnace_position}.")  # Output the placement information.
